header.title: The Secretariat of the Sámi Parliament is closed during 4.-29.7.2016 - Samediggi

body.p: The Secretariat of the Sámi Parliament is closed during 4.-29.7.2016

The Secretariat of the Sámi Parliament is closed 4.-29.7.2016. Deputy Executive Directors are: 4.-8.7.2016 Environment Secretary Anni-Helena Ruotsala, tel. 010 8393 184, mobile 050 5999 725 11.-29.7.2016 Deputy Legal Secretary Kalle Varis, tel. 010 8393 187, mobile 050 384 70 40 and 1.-8.8.2016 Secretary for Education Policy Ulla Aikio-Puoskari tel. 010 839 3112, mobile 040 767 3101
